channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
ok so... i added colors to my chat and stuff but i wunna make it so players are defult, mods are blue, admins are red, and owners are green. I know how to add this with an if statement i just dont know where....
Also i made a simple pk system, kill someone you get 5 points, theres a shop and stuff. but i kill someone and i get 5 points then logout and it saves... then log back in and its gone...?
